___leader.description: Whether to route traffic to just the leader or all instances.

___tls_key.description: Optional TLS private key of this Route. It is only used for HTTP routes.

___tls_cert.description: Optional TLS public certificate of this Route. It is only used for HTTP routes.

___domain.description: Domain name of this Route. It is only used for HTTP routes.

___port.description: The TCP port to listen on for TCP Routes.

___sticky.description: Whether or not to use sticky sessions for this route. It is only used for HTTP routes.

___path.description: Optional path to route to this service, HTTP routes only and exclusive with TLS options.
